description: This file defines several data models and related classes for a restaurant frontend platform. It includes classes for menu items, cart lines, orders, reservations, enum types for order and reservation statuses, and a helper function for currency formatting.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a single menu item with details such as ID, name, description, category, price, image path, and flags for featured or popular status.

classes.name: CartLine
classes.description: Represents a line item in the shopping cart, including a MenuItem and quantity. Provides a getter for line total.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Represents a customer order with ID, creation date, list of cart lines, total amount, status, and optional note.

classes.name: Reservation
classes.description: Represents a reservation request with details like ID, date/time, number of people, customer name, phone, optional note, and status.

methods.name: currency
methods.description: Formats a double as a currency string, prefixing with a dollar sign and fixing to two decimal places.
